overview: Dr. Kharazmi is CEO of Biomonitor and is responsible for the management and day-to-day operations of the company. Prior to Biomonitor, Dr. Kharazmi was co-founder and CEO of LICA Pharmaceuticals A/S since year 2000. Dr. Kharazmi was Head of Research at the Department of Clinical Microbiology at Copenhagen University Hospital (Rigshospitalet), where he during 25 years managed a large number of major international research projects. He holds a PhD in microbiology from the University of California at Davis, USA and has published more than 200 scientific papers in the fields of infection, immunity and drug discovery.
